scripts.build: polymer build && cp -r build server/ && LC_ALL=C find server/build -type f -exec sed -i '' s/node_modules/node_assets/g {} + && mv server/build/es5-bundled/node_modules server/build/es5-bundled/node_assets && mv server/build/es6-bundled/node_modules server/build/es6-bundled/node_assets && mv server/build/esm-bundled/node_modules server/build/esm-bundled/node_assets
scripts.deploy: gcloud app deploy server/app.yaml --project pwa-starter-kit --version prpl-server --no-promote
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
